biocontainers.name: r-rsnps
biocontainers.summary: A programmatic interface to various 'SNP' 'datasets' on the web: 'OpenSNP' (<https://opensnp.org>), and 'NBCIs' 'dbSNP' database (<https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/SNP>). Functions are included for searching for 'NCBI'. For 'OpenSNP', functions are included for getting 'SNPs', and data for 'genotypes', 'phenotypes', annotations, and bulk downloads of data by user.
